Previous: Views Up: Views Next: Teacher's view

While you are not authenticated, you can browse the courses and teachers, but you may not take any action.

Start page

On this page you can only switch to the login site or view courses and teachers by clicking on the respective link.

By clicking on the "courses" or "teachers" link, you get an overview of all courses and teachers respectively.

Teachers

For all teachers you can see their courses, which they lecture respectively.

Course

For every course you can see on the survey the title and the lecturer of the course. Moreover you can see on this survey all lessons. However you are not permitted to see, which student is subscribed to that course.

Lesson

For every lesson you can see its topic and content respectively.

Login

If you are an student or teacher, you can login on this site.

Valid usernames for a teacher are:

  • peter
  • hans

Valid usernames for a student are:

  • stefan
  • tassimo
  • ulli
  • anne
  • lisa
  • marie

Furthermore password equals username.
